basics.name: Carlos Paradis
basics.label: Ph.D. Student and Research Assistant
basics.summary: I am a Graduate Student in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa and a member of the Machine Learning and Data-Driven Software Engineering Labs. My dissertation seeks to understand conceptual evolution of hacker discourse online through text mining and social network dynamics.

interests.name: Data Science, Hadoop Ecosystem, Healthcare, Net-Zero Energy Buildings, Cyber Security, Solar Forecasting
